channel.description: Latest news from the MSCC Research Group

item.title: New grant awarded for computational materials design
item.description: MSCC has been awarded funding to develop machine-learning-enhanced DFT workflows for battery materials.

item.title: New paper: SERS quantification of antibiotics
item.description: A collaborative paper describing SERS methods for trace-level quantification was accepted in Journal of Materials Chemistry B.
